title: [Self-Directed] Empathy-Based Learner Analysis Competency Development for Distance Education Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and experience operating remote education platforms
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: advanced, assessment method: formative assessment-focused, technology environment: digital devices provided

learning_goals: Learners can collect learner experience data across diverse online environments and create an Empathy Map.
Learners can synthesize perspectives from three or more stakeholders (students, instructors, administrators) and incorporate them into instructional design decisions.
Learners can select and apply effective learner analysis methods within constrained conditions (time, budget).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
